QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rotationKWaitCount
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Number f K groups to wait for at each rotation pause

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: falseAlarmProbability
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Detector false alarm probability in percent. Example: 1 percent = 1.0

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: divisions
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Number of divisions to stop rotation at

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: showPulseOnMap
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Show pulse strength on Fly View map

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: useSNRForPulseStrength
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: true: Use snr for pulse string, false: use stft_score

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: antennaOffset
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Antenna rotation offset from vehicle heading
